data.name: 0000 (378.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If we all work together, we'll find the "man-eating classroom" in no time.

data.name: 0001 (378.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Come on, let's go!

data.name: 0002 (378.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wh-Whaa!?

data.name: 0003 (378.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Um, p-please don't push me too much.

data.name: 0004 (378.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's only because you're walking so unenthusiastically!

data.name: 0005 (378.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Come on, get on with it, quickly!

data.name: 0008 (378.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Ahahaha! Go, go!

data.name: 0009 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Good grief… Haruhi's even more energetic than usual.

data.name: 0010 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: On the other hand, it's difficult to imagine Suzumiya in low spirits, right?

data.name: 0011 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Really? I feel like we've seen that countless times already, though.

data.name: 0012 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Is that so? At the very least, I've never seen it.

data.name: 0013 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: In that case, it's probably because she's with you that she looks that way.

data.name: 0014 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi… What's that supposed to mean?

data.name: 0015 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I mean what I said.

data.name: 0016 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: For me, if Suzumiya is always having fun…

data.name: 0017 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That makes me feel at ease.

data.name: 0018 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I understand exactly what Koizumi is trying to say.

data.name: 0019 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The "celestials" that appear as Haruhi builds up stress.

data.name: 0020 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi and the "Agency" do whatever they can so they don't rampage about.

data.name: 0021 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So, what would happen if Haruhi actually encountered unnatural phenomena?

data.name: 0022 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wouldn't we end up right back where we started?

data.name: 0023 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. I hope you can cooperate with us in that respect.

data.name: 0024 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Cooperate, huh… Say, Nagato…

data.name: 0025 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's going on with the "man-eating classroom" now?

data.name: 0027 (378.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The singularities are slowly getting repaired, but not to the point of it resurfacing.

data.name: 0028 (378.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: However, it's only a matter of time.

data.name: 0029 (378.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Soon the singularities will interfere with each other, and the space will shift out of phase.

data.name: 0030 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: … Where is it?

data.name: 0031 (378.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The third floor of the main building, at the end of the corridor.

data.name: 0032 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I see. It's past 1-9's classroom, so the "man-eating classroom" is 1-10.

data.name: 0033 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: … Seems like it'd be a disaster to let Haruhi go there right now.

data.name: 0034 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: For now, let's buy ourselves some time.

data.name: 0035 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Agreed.

data.name: 0038 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, Haruhi!

data.name: 0039 (378.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What, Kyon? Aren't you acting a little cocky for someone who was late?

data.name: 0040 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We're going to investigate the first year classrooms, right?

data.name: 0041 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's not very efficient for us to do it as a single group.

data.name: 0042 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How about we split into two groups?

data.name: 0043 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: First year is split over two floors, so we can get this over faster if we divide into two teams.

data.name: 0044 (378.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're just going to slack off either way, right?

data.name: 0045 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She has zero faith in me.

data.name: 0046 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'll go together with him.

data.name: 0047 (378.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mhm. I suppose if you're with Koizumi, I probably don't have to worry about you slacking.

data.name: 0048 (378.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Very well, then let's split into a girl team and a boy team.

data.name: 0049 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Then, us, the boy team, shall go investigate the third floor.

data.name: 0050 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Miss Suzumiya's girl team can search from the second floor.

data.name: 0052 (378.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: I'm in the girl team?

data.name: 0053 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Of course.

data.name: 0054 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't bother Asahina in an way, got it?

data.name: 0055 (378.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: You too!

data.name: 0056 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: … She really can't keep her mouth shut.

data.name: 0057 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, thanks to Koizumi's conversational masterclass, Haruhi's been convinced.

data.name: 0058 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He even organised where we're each going to. Credit where credit's due.

data.name: 0059 (378.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Then, it's a race to see who can finish their investigation first!

data.name: 0060 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Being fast shouldn't be a win in this situation, though… Good grief.

data.name: 0063 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Even though we say we're going to investigate…

data.name: 0064 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We already know what's going on, so there's nothing to investigate, right?

data.name: 0065 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm just glad we have a method to prevent Miss Suzumiya from getting too close.

data.name: 0066 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's for sure…

data.name: 0067 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As I move down the corridor, I feel like I'm going to get mixed up with abnormal space again.

data.name: 0068 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If it happens again this time, who's going to come help me?

data.name: 0069 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's a non-zero chance that help won't come, right?

data.name: 0070 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: … Can't we use that to our advantage?

data.name: 0071 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What do you mean, "that?"

data.name: 0072 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The classroom's plate.

data.name: 0073 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: There's something sticking out with "1-6" written on it, right?

data.name: 0074 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah, that? But, how would we use it?

data.name: 0075 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: How about we take the plate off, and put class 7's plate in its place?

data.name: 0076 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's the point?

data.name: 0077 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Then class 8's plate in 7's place, class 9's plate in class 8's…

data.name: 0078 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What about over class 9? Put this class 6 plate in?

data.name: 0079 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We don't necessarily need to put anything in class 9's place, right?

data.name: 0080 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Because that will be class 1-10…

data.name: 0082 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I see. That's what I thought.

data.name: 0083 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So basically, the plan is to shift the classrooms across?

data.name: 0084 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wait, there's a huge oversight in this plan.

data.name: 0085 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Go ahead.

data.name: 0086 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What about class 6? It's just going to disappear, right?

data.name: 0087 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's an obvious fact that class 6 is here. Even Haruhi knows.

data.name: 0088 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: She'll see through it straight away, that it's a mere childish prank.

data.name: 0089 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Isn't that just fine?

data.name: 0090 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Rather, I should probably say that's exactly the point of this whole exercise.

data.name: 0091 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You're being annoyingly indirect. Just explain the point.

data.name: 0092 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Alright. I'll say it frankly.

data.name: 0093 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We'll have Miss Suzumiya believe it's a mere childish prank.

data.name: 0094 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Let Haruhi know it's a prank?

data.name: 0095 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: There are people who fell for that childish prank…

data.name: 0096 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: … The computer society!

data.name: 0097 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Precisely. The computer society fell for the prank.

data.name: 0098 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: And we were swept up by the words of those who got pranked…

data.name: 0099 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What do you think?

data.name: 0100 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: … Would Haruhi accept that?

data.name: 0101 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well, I can't say that.

data.name: 0102 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: But I think it's certainly more useful than standing around and doing nothing.

data.name: 0103 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I guess that's right… Okay, got it.

data.name: 0104 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I guess we should just get this 1-6 plate off to start?

data.name: 0105 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. And then we'll affix the class 7 plate there.

data.name: 0106 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Got it. Wait just a sec.

data.name: 0107 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The plate's attached at a pretty high point. … Can I reach it?

data.name: 0108 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Can you get it?

data.name: 0109 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, I'm sure I can reach if I stretch.

data.name: 0110 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: And, just as I tried to take the plate…

data.name: 0111 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 階段の方から足音と、大きな声が 聞こえてきた

data.name: 0112 (378.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 二人とも！ 首尾はどうかしら！ こっちはもう終わったわよ！

data.name: 0113 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 早いなおい！

data.name: 0114 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: 急いでください！

data.name: 0115 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: と言ったって、見つかったらそれこ そ台無しだぞ！

data.name: 0116 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: 今ならまだ間に合うはずです、早く お願いします！

data.name: 0117 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 本当に間に合うのか……？

data.name: 0118 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: よっと！

data.name: 0119 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 背伸びしてもギリギリ届かなかった プレートを、ジャンプして取った！

data.name: 0120 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: そのはずみにバランスを崩して……

data.name: 0121 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: う、わ！？

data.name: 0122 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: 危ない！

data.name: 0123 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: なんとか肩を古泉に支えてもらい 俺は尻餅をまぬがれた

data.name: 0124 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 悪いな

data.name: 0125 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: いいえ、この程度のことなら いつでも

data.name: 0126 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: しかし、全てのプレートを１つずつ ずらしている時間はなさそうですね

data.name: 0127 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: どうするんだ、諦めるのか？

data.name: 0128 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ……やむを得ませんね

data.name: 0129 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 結局、６組のプレートを取り外した だけで終わっちまった

data.name: 0130 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ひとまず、これだけでもイタズラの 痕跡に仕立てることが可能でしょう

data.name: 0131 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: だといいんだが……

data.name: 0132 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: このプレートは、どうする？

data.name: 0133 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: では、僕が預かっておきましょう

data.name: 0134 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: そう言ってプレートを受け取った古 泉は、懐にそれをしまい込んだ

data.name: 0135 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 役に立てばいいんだが

data.name: 0136 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: そうですね……うまくいくことを祈 りましょう

data.name: 0137 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 駄目だ、プレートを取っているとこ をハルヒに見られたら、おしまいだ

data.name: 0138 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 小細工がバレるどころか、激昂して 自分で調べるとか言い出しかねん

data.name: 0139 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: そうなったら、９組の向こう…… 例の異空間がバレる恐れがある！

data.name: 0140 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ……判りました、諦めましょう

data.name: 0141 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: 他に涼宮さんの興味を逸らす手段を 考えておかないといけませんね

data.name: 0142 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ああ。ハルヒ好みの話題を用意して おかないとな

data.name: 0144 (378.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: どう？ そっちは調べ終わったの？

data.name: 0145 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 階段を一段抜かしで駆け上がってき たハルヒは、俺達にそう尋ねた

data.name: 0146 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ああ、今、奥の方まで調べて戻って きたところだ

data.name: 0147 (378.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: サボってたらとっちめてやろうと 思ってたのに、残念だわ

data.name: 0148 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 実際には俺も古泉も、この場からほ とんど動いていない

data.name: 0149 (378.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: それがバレたらえらいことになりそ うではある

data.name: 0150 (378.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: で、なにか収穫はあったわけ？

data.name: 0151 (378.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: あったように見えるか？

data.name: 0152 (378.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: おかしなところは一つもない 普通の廊下と教室でしたよ

data.name: 0153 (378.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: そう……じゃあ、結局なにも見つか らなかったわけね

data.name: 0154 (378.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 急いで取る
